Package org.svvrl.goal.gui.action

Class Summary
AboutAction This is an action that displays the information about GOAL in a dialog.
AbstractAlphabetAction This class provides an action that can abstract the alphabet of an automaton.
AbstractComplementAction<T extends ComplementConstruction<FSA,FSA>> This is an abstract action for complementing an NBW.
AbstractNewAutomatonAction<T extends Automaton> This is an action for creating new automata.
AbstractNewEditableAction<T extends Editable> This is an action relying a creator to create new editable objects.
AbstractStepByStepTranslationAction<F extends Logic,T extends Automaton> An AbstractStepByStepTranslationAction takes a translator as a parameter and uses the translator to translate a formula step-by-step.
AbstractTranslationAction<F extends Logic,T extends Automaton> A TranslationAction takes a translator as a parameter and uses the translator to translate formulae.
AbstractZoomAction This is an abstract class for zooming an automaton at some level.
AperiodicAction This class provides an action that determines if the language of a classic finite state automaton or a Büchi automaton is aperiodic, that is, the language is star-free.
AutomatonConsistencyAction This is an action that tests if an automaton is consistent.
AutomatonOperationAction<T extends Automaton,O extends Automaton> This is an abstract action for operations on automata that will produce new automata.
AutomatonSearchAction This is an action for searching components in an automaton.
BuchiRepositoryAction This is an action for displaying automata in the local repository.
BuchiStoreAction This is an action for displaying automata in Büchi Store.
BuchiStoreUploaderAction This is an action that displays a dialog for uploading the active Büchi automaton to the Büchi Store.
CCJ09Actions This class contains several actions provided by translation algorithm in [CCJ09].
CCJ09Actions.QPTL2NBWAction This is an action that translates a QPTL formula into an equivalent NBW by the translation algorithm in [CCJ09].
CheckUpdateAction This is an action for checking if there is a newer version of GOAL available.
ClassicalMinimizationAction This is an action that minimizes a classic finite state automaton.
ClassicComplementAction This is an action for complementing a classic finite state automaton.
ClearAllRecentFileAction This is an action for clearing the list of recent files.
ClickButtonAction This is an action that clicks a button.
CloseActiveTabAction This is an action for closing the active tab of a window.
CloseAllTabsAction This is an action for closing all tabs of a window.
ClosureAction This is an action for taking the closure of an NBW.
ConcatenationAction This is an action that concatenates two automata.
ContainmentAction This is an action that tests if an automaton A is contained in another automaton B by constructing the intersection of A and the complement of B explicitly and checking if the intersection is empty.
ContractAlphabetAction This is an action that removes an atomic proposition or a classical symbol from the alphabet of an automaton.
ConvertAction This is an action that converts an automaton into other types of automata.
ConvertAlphabetTypeAction This is an action that opens a dialog for entering the mapping between two alphabet types and converts the alphabet type of the active automaton.
ConvertAlternationStyleAction This is an action that converts the alternation style of an alternating automaton.
ConvertLabelPositionAction This class provides a conversion of label positions.
ConvertToComplementDBWAction This is an action that converts a DCW into a complement DBW.
ConvertToComplementDCWAction This is an action that converts a DBW into a complement DCW.
ConvertToComplementDMWAction This is an action that converts a DMW into a complement DMW.
ConvertToComplementDPWAction This is an action that converts a DPW into a complement DPW.
ConvertToComplementDRWAction This is an action that converts a DSW into a complement DRW.
ConvertToComplementDSWAction This is an action that converts a DRW into a complement DSW.
ConvertToComplementNABWAction This is an action that converts a NCW into a complement NABW.
ConvertToComplementNACWAction This is an action that converts a NBW into a complement NACW.
ConvertToComplementNAPWAction This is an action that converts an NAPW into a complement NAPW.
ConvertToDBWByBK09Action This is an action that converts an automaton into an equivalent DBW through DCW by the approach in [BK09].
ConvertToDBWByLandweberAction This is an action that converts an automaton into an equivalent DBW through DMW by the approach in [Lan69].
ConvertToNBGAction This is an action that converts a game into an equivalent NBG.
ConvertToNBWAction This is an action that converts an automaton into an equivalent NBW.
ConvertToNCGAction This is an action that converts a game into an equivalent NCG.
ConvertToNCWAction This is an action that converts an automaton into an equivalent NCW (if the source automaton is NCW-recognizable) or a larger NCW (in language).
ConvertToNGBGAction This is an action that converts a game into an equivalent NGBG.
ConvertToNGBWAction This is an action that converts an automaton into an equivalent NGBW.
ConvertToNMGAction This is an action that converts a game into an equivalent NMG.
ConvertToNMWAction This is an action that converts an automaton into an equivalent NMW.
ConvertToNPGAction This is an action that converts a game into an equivalent NPG.
ConvertToNPWAction This is an action that converts an automaton into an equivalent NPW.
ConvertToNRGAction This is an action that converts a game into an equivalent NRG.
ConvertToNRWAction This is an action that converts an automaton into an equivalent NRW.
ConvertToNSGAction This is an action that converts a game into an equivalent NSG.
ConvertToNSWAction This is an action that converts an automaton into an equivalent NSW.
ConvertToNTBWAction This is an action that converts an automaton into an equivalent NTBW.
ConvertToNTGBWAction This is an action that converts an automaton into an equivalent NTGBW.
ConvertToOmegaRegularExpressionAction This is an action that converts an ω-automaton into an equivalent ω-regular expression.
ConvertToRegularExpressionAction This is an action that converts a classic finite state automaton into an equivalent regular expression.
CopyAction This class provides an action for copying text in a formula editor or copying states in an automaton editor.
CopyAsGasTeXAction This class provides an action that can copy an automaton as LaTeX (GasTeX) code.
CopyAsPromelaAction This class provides an action that can copy an automaton as Promela code.
CopyAsTikzAction This class provides an action that can copy an automaton as LaTeX (Tikz) code.
CopyAsVaucansonAction This class provides an action that can copy an automaton as LaTeX (Vaucanson-G) code.
CouvreurActions This class contains several actions provided by the Couvreur translators.
CouvreurActions.QPTL2NBWAction This is an action that translates a QPTL formula into an equivalent NBW by Couvreur's algorithm.
CouvreurActions.QPTL2NTGBWAction This is an action that translates a QPTL formula into an equivalent NTGBW by Couvreur's algorithm.
CutAction This class provides an action for cutting text in a formula editor.
DebugCoreAction This is an action that toggles the logging of debugging information produced from the core package.
DebugExceptionAction This is an action that toggles the option of throwing exceptions in the console.
DebugUIAction This is an action that toggles the display of UI debugging information.
DelayedSimulatedAction This is an action for testing if a Büchi automaton is delayed simulated by another Büchi automaton by the approach in [EWS01].
DelayedSimulationAction This is an action for displaying the delayed simulation relation by the approach in [EWS01].
DelayedSimulationSimplificationAction This is an action that simplifies an NBW by a delayed simulation relation.
DeleteAction This class provides an action for deleting selected automaton components or selected text in a formula editor.
DetachAction This is an action that moves the active tab to a new window.
DeterministicAction This is an action that tests if an automaton is deterministic.
DirectSimulatedAction This is an action for testing if a Büchi automaton is direct simulated by another Büchi automaton.
DisplayGridlinesAction This is an action that toggles the display of gridlines.
DisplayGuidelinesAction This is an action that toggles the display of guidelines.
DisposeAction This is an action that disposes a Window.
DuplicateAction This is an action that duplicates the active automaton.
EditableAction<I extends Editable,O> An EditableAction is an action applicable to some non-null editable objects.
EfficientSimulationAction This is an action for displaying the direct simulation relation computed by the EfficientSimilarity procedure in [HHK95].
EliminateEpsilonAction This class provides an action for eliminating ε-transitions of a classic finite state automaton with a classical alphabet.
EmptinessAction This is an action that checks the emptiness of an FSA.
EquivalenceWithAutomatonAction This is an action that checks if two automata are equivalent.
EquivalenceWithFormulaAction This is an action that checks if an automaton is equivalent to a QPTL formula.
ExitAction This is an action that terminates the GOAL process.
ExpandAlphabetAction This is an action that expands the alphabet of the active automaton by a new atomic proposition or classical symbol.
ExportAction This is an action that exports the object in the active editor to another file or another format.
ExportMultipleAction This class provides an action that can export multiple objects in a single file by GFFCollectionCodec.
ExtendedCouvreurActions This class contains several actions provided by the extended Couvreur translators.
ExtendedCouvreurActions.QPTL2NBWAction This is an action that translates a QPTL formula into an equivalent NBW by the extended Couvreur's algorithm.
ExtendedCouvreurActions.QPTL2NTGBWAction This is an action that translates a QPTL formula into an equivalent NTGBW by the extended Couvreur's algorithm.
ExtendedGPVWActions This class contains several actions provided by the extended GPVW translators.
ExtendedGPVWActions.QPTL2LOSNBWAction This is an action that translates a QPTL formula into an equivalent label-on-state NBW by extended GPVW.
ExtendedGPVWActions.QPTL2LOSNGBWAction This is an action that translates a QPTL formula into an equivalent label-on-state NGBW by extended GPVW.
ExtendedGPVWActions.QPTL2NBWAction This is an action that translates a QPTL formula into an equivalent NBW by extended GPVW.
ExtendedGPVWActions.QPTL2NGBWAction This is an action that translates a QPTL formula into an equivalent NGBW by extended GPVW.
ExtendedGPVWActions.StepByStepQPTL2LOSNGBWAction This is an action that translates step-by-step a QPTL formula into an equivalent label-on-state NGBW by extended GPVW.
ExtendedGPVWPlusActions This class contains several actions provided by the extended GPVW+ translators.
ExtendedGPVWPlusActions.QPTL2LOSNBWAction This is an action that translates a QPTL formula into an equivalent label-on-state NBW by extended GPVW+.
ExtendedGPVWPlusActions.QPTL2LOSNGBWAction This is an action that translates a QPTL formula into an equivalent label-on-state NGBW by extended GPVW+.
ExtendedGPVWPlusActions.QPTL2NBWAction This is an action that translates a QPTL formula into an equivalent NBW by extended GPVW+.
ExtendedGPVWPlusActions.QPTL2NGBWAction This is an action that translates a QPTL formula into an equivalent NGBW by extended GPVW+.
ExtendedGPVWPlusActions.StepByStepQPTL2LOSNGBWAction This is an action that translates step-by-step a QPTL formula into an equivalent label-on-state NGBW by extended GPVW+.

ExtendedLTL2AUTActions.QPTL2NGBWAction This is an action that translates a QPTL formula into an equivalent NGBW by extended LTL2AUT.
ExtendedLTL2AUTActions.StepByStepQPTL2LOSNGBWAction This is an action that translates step-by-step a QPTL formula into an equivalent label-on-state NGBW by extended LTL2AUT.
ExtendedLTL2AUTPlusActions This class contains several actions provided by extended LTl2AUT+.
ExtendedLTL2AUTPlusActions.QPTL2LOSNBWAction This is an action that translates a QPTL formula into an equivalent label-on-state NBW by extended LTL2AUT+.
ExtendedLTL2AUTPlusActions.QPTL2LOSNGBWAction This is an action that translates a QPTL formula into an equivalent label-on-state NGBW by extended LTL2AUT+.

ExtendedLTL2BuchiActions.QPTL2NBWAction This is an action that translates a QPTL formula into an equivalent NBW by extended LTL2Buchi.
ExtendedLTL2BuchiActions.QPTL2NTGBWAction This is an action that translates a QPTL formula into an equivalent NTGBW by extended LTL2Buchi.
ExtendedModellaActions This class contains several actions provided by the extended MoDeLLa translators.
ExtendedModellaActions.QPTL2LOSNBWAction This is an action that translates a QPTL formula into an equivalent label-on-state NBW by extended MoDeLLa.
ExtendedModellaActions.QPTL2LOSNGBWAction This is an action that translates a QPTL formula into an equivalent label-on-state NGBW by extended MoDeLLa.
ExtendedModellaActions.QPTL2NBWAction This is an action that translates a QPTL formula into an equivalent NBW by extended MoDeLLa.
ExtendedModellaActions.QPTL2NGBWAction This is an action that translates a QPTL formula into an equivalent NGBW by extended MoDeLLa.
ExtendedModellaActions.StepByStepQPTL2LOSNGBWAction This is an action that translates step-by-step a QPTL formula into an equivalent label-on-state NGBW by extended MoDeLLa.
FairSimulatedAction This is an action for testing if a Büchi automaton is fairly simulated by another Büchi automaton by the approach in [EWS01] for label-on-transition Büchi automata or by the approach in [GBS02] for label-on-state Büchi automata.
FairSimulationAction This is an action for displaying the fair simulation relation by the approach in [EWS01] for label-on-transition Büchi automata or by the approach in [GBS02] for label-on-state Büchi automata.
FairSimulationSimplificationAction This is an action that simplifies a label-on-state NBW by a fair simulation relation.
FindCyclesAction This is an action that finds and displays all elementary cycles in the active automaton.
FindMSCCAction This is an action that finds and displays the maximal strongly connected components of the active automaton.
FloatableToolbarAction This is an action that toggles the floatable state of tool bars.
FSA2GameAction This class provides an action that can convert an automaton to a turn-based game.
FSAClassificationAction This is an action that classifies an automaton into the temporal hierarchy.
FSAProductAction This class provides an action that takes the product of two FSAs.
GameConversionAction This is an action that converts a game into other types of games.
GameGenerationAction This is an action for generating games from inputs and outputs.
GameProductAction This class provides an action that takes the product of a game and a finite state automaton.
HelpContentsAction This is an action that displays the help content.
HomomorphismAction This is an action that checks if two automata are homomorphic.
HopcroftMinimizationAction This is an action that minimizes a classic finite state automaton.
ImportFromTextAction This is an action that can parse an editable object from a text.
IncTableauActions This class contains several actions provided by the Incremental Tableau translators.
IncTableauActions.QPTL2LOSNBWAction This is an action that translates a QPTL formula into an equivalent label-on-state NBW by Incremental Tableau.
IncTableauActions.QPTL2LOSNGBWAction This is an action that translates a QPTL formula into an equivalent label-on-state NGBW by Incremental Tableau.
IncTableauActions.QPTL2NBWAction This is an action that translates a QPTL formula into an equivalent NBW by Incremental Tableau.
IncTableauActions.QPTL2NGBWAction This is an action that translates a QPTL formula into an equivalent NGBW by Incremental Tableau.
InputSimulatorAction This class provides an action that can display an input simulator of an automaton on some word.
InputTestAction This is an action that tests directly if an input sequence is accepted by an automaton.
IntersectionAction This is an action that takes the intersection of two automata.
IsomorphismAction This is an action that checks if two automata are isomorphic.
KP02Actions This class contains several actions provided by KP02.
KP02Actions.QPTL2NBWAction This is an action that translates a QPTL formula into an equivalent Büchi automaton by KP02.
KurshanComplementAction This is an action that complements an NBW by Kurshan's construction.
LayoutAction This is an action that lays out the active automaton by a layout algorithm.
LogicAction<I extends Logic,O> A LogicAction takes a FormulaHolder as the input.
LTL2BAActions This class contains several actions provided by LTL2BA.
LTL2BAActions.QPTL2NBWAction This is an action that translates a QPTL formula into an equivalent NBW by LTL2BA.
LTL2BAActions.QPTL2NTGBWAction This is an action that translates a QPTL formula into an equivalent NTGBW by LTL2BA.
LTL2BAActions.QPTL2VWAAAction This is an action that translates a QPTL formula into an equivalent VWAA by LTL2BA.

LTL2BuchiActions.QPTL2NTGBWAction This is an action that translates a QPTL formula into an equivalent NTGBW by LTL2Buchi.
MaximizeAcceptanceSetAction This is an action that maximizes the acceptance set of an NBW without changing its language.
MergeAction This is an action that merges another automaton to the active automaton.
MergeStatesAction This class provides an action for merging selected states in an automaton.
MinimizeAcceptanceSetAction This is an action that simplifies the acceptance set of an NBW without changing its language.
ModellaActions This class contains several actions provided by the MoDeLLa translators.
ModellaActions.QPTL2LOSNBWAction This is an action that translates a QPTL formula into an equivalent label-on-state NBW by MoDeLLa.

ModellaActions.StepByStepQPTL2LOSNGBWAction This is an action that translates step-by-step a QPTL formula into an equivalent label-on-state NGBW by MoDeLLa.
ModifiedSafraComplementAction This is an action that complements an NBW by the modified Safra's construction.
ModifiedSafraContainmentAction This is an action that tests if an automaton is contained in another automaton based on incremental modified Safra's construction.
MoveTabAction This is an action that moves the active tab of a source window to a target window.
MoveToNextWindowAction This is an action that moves the active tab of a window to its next window.
MoveToPreviousWindowAction This is an action that moves the active tab of a window to its previous window.
MSComplementAction This is an action that complements an NBW by Muller-Schupp construction.
MSContainmentAction This is an action that tests if an automaton is contained in another automaton based on incremental Muller-Schupp construction.
NaiveSimulationAction This is an action that can display the direct simulation relation and the reverse simulation relation defined in [SB00] based on a naive computation procedure.
NBWToDPWByPitermanAction This is an action that determinizes an NBW to a DPW by Safra-Piterman construction.
NBWToDRWByModifiedSafraAction This is an action that determinizes an NBW to a DRW by modified Safra's construction.
NBWToDRWByMSAction This is an action that determinizes an NBW to a DRW by Muller-Schupp construction.
NBWToDRWBySafraAction This is an action that determinizes an NBW to a DRW by Safra's construction.
NegationNormalFormAction This class provides an action for converting a logic formula into negation normal form.
NewACTLAction This is an action that creates a new ACTL formula.

NFWToDFWAction This is an action that determinizes a classic automaton to another classic automaton.
OmegaAction This is an action that creates a nondeterministic Büchi automaton from a classic finite state automaton.
OmegaRegularExpressionTranslationAction This class provides an action that can translate an ω-regular expression to a Büchi automaton.
OpenAction This is an action that opens a file as an editable object.
OpenAllRecentFileAction This is an action that opens all recent files.
OpenRecentFileAction This is an action that opens a recent file.
ParityCompressionAction This is an action for compressing a parity acceptance condition.
ParityInterpretationAction This is an action that converts a parity condition under an interpretation to an equivalent parity condition under another interpretation.
ParityPropagationAction This is an action for propagating parities of states in a parity acceptance condition.
PasteAction This class provides an action for pasting text to a formula editor or pasting states to an automaton.
PastFutureSeparationAction This class provides an action for separating the past operators and the future operators in a QPTL formula.
PitermanComplementAction This is an action that complements an NBW by Safra-Piterman construction.
PitermanContainmentAction This is an action that tests if an automaton is contained in another automaton based on incremental Safra-Piterman construction.

PLTL2BAActions.QPTL2TWVWAAAction This is an action that translates a QPTL formula into an equivalent 2VWAA by PLTL2BA.
PMT02Actions This class contains several actions provided by the tableau construction in [PMT02].
PMT02Actions.ACTL2LOSNBWAction This is an action that translates an ACTL formula into an equivalent label-on-state NBW by the tableau construction in [PMT02].
PMT02Actions.ACTL2LOSNGBWAction This is an action that translates an ACTL formula into an equivalent label-on-state NGBW by the tableau construction in [PMT02].
PMT02Actions.ACTL2NBWAction This is an action that translates an ACTL formula into an equivalent NBW by the tableau construction in [PMT02].
PMT02Actions.ACTL2NGBWAction This is an action that translates an ACTL formula into an equivalent NGBW by the tableau construction in [PMT02].
PreferenceAction This is an action that opens the preference dialog.
PrenexNormalFormAction This class provides an action for converting a logic formula into prenex normal form.
PreviousTabAction This is an action that makes the previous tab active.
PreviousWindowAction This is an action that makes the previous window active.
PrintAction This is an action that prints an editable object.
PromelaAction This is an action that creates a dialog for displaying the Promela code of an NBW.
PropertyEditorAction This is an action that toggles the visibility of the property editor.
PruningFairSetsAction This is an action that simplifies an NGBW by pruning fair sets proposed in [Somenzi and Bloom.
QPTL2BAActions This class contains several actions provided by QPTL2BA.
QPTL2BAActions.CanonicalQPTL2NTWACWAction This is an action that translates a QPTL formula in canonical forms into an equivalent two-way alternating co-Büchi automaton by QPTL2BA.
QPTL2BAActions.FutureQPTL2NABWAction This is an action that translates a QPTL formula without past operators into an equivalent alternating Büchi automaton by QPTL2BA.
QPTL2BAActions.QPTL2NBWAction This is an action that translates a QPTL formula into an equivalent NBW by QPTL2BA.
QPTLLanguageClassificationAction This is an action that classifies the language of a QPTL formula into the Temporal Hierarchy via translation to automata.
QPTLSyntaxClassificationAction This is an action that classifies an LTL formula into standard κ-formulae via syntax check where κ is safety, guarantee, obligation, recurrence, persistence, or reactivity.
RabinIndexSimplificationAction This is an action that simplifies the acceptance condition of an NPW by Rabin index.
RamseyComplementAction This is an action that complements an NBW by Ramsey-based construction.
RankComplementAction This is an action that complements an NBW by rank-based construction.
RecentFilesAction This is an action that displays a dialog containing the list of recent files.
RedoAction This is an action that performs a redo.
ReduceAltConnectorsAction This is an action that removes or merges unnecessary alternating connectors from an alternating automaton.
ReducedSplitTreeAction This class provides an action that can display a reduced split tree of an automaton on some word.
ReduceStatesAction This is an action that removes unreachable and dead states from an automaton.
RefinedSimulationAction This is an action for displaying the direct simulation relation computed by the RefinedSimilarity procedure in [HHK95].
RegularExpressionTranslationAction This class provides an action that can translate a regular expression to a classic finite state automaton.
RenamePropositionAction This is an action that renames an atomic proposition or a classical symbol in the alphabet of an automaton.
ReplacementAction This class provides an action for the replacement of strings represented as classic finite automata.
ResetAccAction This is an action that resets the acceptance condition of an automaton.
ReverseNFWAction This is an action that reverses a classic finite state automaton.
RunDagAction This class provides an action that can display a run dag of an automaton on some word.
RunTreeAction This class provides an action that can display a run tree of an automaton on some word.
SafraComplementAction This is an action that complements an NBW by Safra's construction.
SafraContainmentAction This is an action that tests if an automaton is contained in another automaton based on incremental Safra's construction.
SatisfiabilityAction This class provides an action for testing if a logic formula is satisfiable.
SaveAction This is an action that saves the object in the active editor to a file.
SaveAllAction This is an action that saves objects in all editors to files.
SaveAsAction This is an action that saves the object in the active editor to another file or another format.
SchematicSimulationAction This is an action for displaying the direct simulation relation computed by the SchematicSimilarity1 procedure in [HHK95].
SelectAllAction This is an action that selects all states and transitions of an automaton.
SemanticallyDeterministicAction This is an action that tests if an automaton is semantically deterministic, that is, equivalent to some deterministic Büchi automaton.
ShowAtomicPropositionsAction This is an action that displays the atomic propositions or classical symbols in the alphabet of an automaton.
SimplifyFormulaAction This is an action that simplifies logic formulae based on registered formula rewriters.
SimulationEquivalenceAction This is an action that tests if two automata are simulation equivalent.
SimulationSimplificationAction This is an action that simplifies a finite state automaton by simulation relations.
SliceAntichainAction This is an action that tests if an automaton is contained in another automaton based on slice-based antichain.
SliceComplementAction This is an action that complements an NBW by slice-based construction.
SliceContainmentAction This is an action that tests if an automaton is contained in another automaton based on incremental slice-based construction.
SnapToGridAction This is an action that toggles the option of snapping states to grid.
SolveGameAction This is an action for solving games.
SplitTreeAction This class provides an action that can display a split tree of an automaton on some word.
StepByStepModifiedSafraComplementAction This is an action that step-by-step complements an NBW by the modified Safra's construction.
StepByStepMSComplementAction This is an action that step-by-step complements an NBW by Muller-Schupp construction.
StepByStepPitermanComplementAction This is an action that step-by-step complements an NBW by Safra-Piterman construction.
StepByStepRankComplementAction This is an action that step-by-step complements an NBW by rank-based construction.
StepByStepSafraComplementAction This is an action that step-by-step complements an NBW by Safra's construction.
StepByStepSliceComplementAction This is an action that step-by-step complements an NBW by slice-based construction.
StepByStepSolveGameAction This is an action for solving games step-by-step.
StepByStepWAAComplementAction This is an action that step-by-step complements an NBW by the WAA construction.
StepByStepWAPAComplementAction This is an action that step-by-step complements an NBW by WAPA construction.
TableauActions This class contains several actions provided by the Tableau translators.
TableauActions.QPTL2LOSNBWAction This is an action that translates a QPTL formula into an equivalent label-on-state NBW by Tableau.
TableauActions.QPTL2LOSNGBWAction This is an action that translates a QPTL formula into an equivalent label-on-state NGBW by Tableau.
TableauActions.QPTL2NBWAction This is an action that translates a QPTL formula into an equivalent NBW by Tableau.
TableauActions.QPTL2NGBWAction This is an action that translates a QPTL formula into an equivalent NGBW by Tableau.
TableauActions.StepByStepQPTL2LOSNGBWAction This is an action that translates step-by-step a QPTL formula into an equivalent label-on-state NGBW by Tableau.
TemporalTesterActions This class contains several actions provided by the Temporal Tester translators.
TemporalTesterActions.QPTL2LOSNBWAction This is an action that translates a QPTL formula into an equivalent label-on-state NBW by Temporal Tester.
TemporalTesterActions.QPTL2LOSNGBWAction This is an action that translates a QPTL formula into an equivalent label-on-state NGBW by Temporal Tester.
TemporalTesterActions.QPTL2NBWAction This is an action that translates a QPTL formula into an equivalent NBW by Temporal Tester.
TemporalTesterActions.QPTL2NGBWAction This is an action that translates a QPTL formula into an equivalent NGBW by Temporal Tester.
UndoAction This is an action that performs an undo.
UnionAction This is an action that takes the union of two automata.
ValidityAction This class provides an action for testing if a logic formula is valid.
WAAComplementAction This is an action that complements an NBW by WAA construction.
WAPAComplementAction This is an action that complements an NBW by WAPA construction.
WindowAction<T> A WindowAction is an action in a GOAL window.
WringOptimizationAction This is an action that simplifies an NGBW by the Wring approach proposed in [Somenzi and Bloom.
ZoomActions This class provides several actions for changing the zoom level.
ZoomActions.CustomZoomAction This is an action that can zoom in/out an automaton with a custom zoom level.
ZoomActions.Zoom100Action This is an action that sets the zoom level to 100%.
ZoomActions.Zoom125Action This is an action that sets the zoom level to 125%.
ZoomActions.Zoom150Action This is an action that sets the zoom level to 150%.
ZoomActions.Zoom175Action This is an action that sets the zoom level to 175%.
ZoomActions.Zoom200Action This is an action that sets the zoom level to 200%.
ZoomActions.Zoom50Action This is an action that sets the zoom level to 50%.
ZoomActions.Zoom75Action This is an action that sets the zoom level to 75%.
ZoomActions.ZoomAutoAction This is an action that sets the zoom level to auto.
 

Exception Summary
ExecutionException This exception is thrown when there is an error during the execution of an action.
